txt.en: 'Good, good! Párgrub is very pleased with your fighting, yes.'
'Maybe you could help out this poor snaga, [placeholder]. Fight again and this time I bet on you. You must win though, or Párgrub get nothing!'
Párgrub can be found near Thorzhaf.\n\nYou should speak with Párgrub about the match.
A new pit-fighting tournament has begun and you have been asked to participate.
